bill.title: Relating To Firearms.
bill.description: Requires physical inspection of firearms under certain circumstances. Sunsets 6/30/2025. (CD1)

referrals.name: Public Safety, Intergovernmental and Military Affairs

history.action: Pending introduction.
Introduced and Pass First Reading.
Referred to JHA, referral sheet 3
Bill scheduled to be heard by JHA on Tuesday, 02-08-22 2:00PM in House conference room 325 Via Videoconference.

The committees on JHA recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) Nakashima, Matayoshi, Ichiyama, Lowen, McKelvey, Nakamura, Takumi, Todd; Ayes with reservations: none; 2 Noes: Representative(s) Tokioka, Ward; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) D. Kobayashi, LoPresti.
Reported from JHA (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 783-22) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and placement on the calendar for Third Reading.

Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1; placed on the calendar for Third Reading with Representative(s) Matsumoto voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Har, Kong, Okimoto, Tokioka, Ward voting no (5) and Representative(s) Matayoshi, McDermott, Todd excused (3).

Passed Third Reading with Representative(s) Matsumoto voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Har, Kong, McDermott, Okimoto, Tokioka, Ward voting no (6) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 311).
Passed First Reading.
Referred to PSM, JDC.
Re-Referred to JDC.
The committee(s) on JDC has scheduled a public hearing on 03-29-22 9:30AM; Conference Room 016 & Videoconference.
The committee(s) on JDC deferred the measure until 03-30-22 10:45AM; Conference Room 016 & Videoconference.

The committee(s) on JDC recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDC were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Rhoads, Acasio, Kim, Lee; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Gabbard; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Keohokalole, Fevella.
Reported from JDC (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 3891) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and placement on the calendar for Third Reading.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1).
48 Hrs. Notice 04-12-22.
Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 1). Ayes, 22; Aye(s) with reservations: none. Noes, 3 (Senator(s) Fevella, Gabbard, Misalucha). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 823) in amended form (SD 1).
House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).
Received notice of disagreement (Hse. Com. No. 715).
House Conferees Appointed: Nakashima Chair; Matayoshi, Matsumoto.
Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 718).
Senate Conferees Appointed: Rhoads Chair; Keohokalole, Lee, Fevella.
Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 879).
Bill scheduled for Conference Committee Meeting on Friday, 04-22-22 2:00PM in conference room 325.
Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Monday 04-25-22 2:00PM in conference room 325.

The Conference Committee recommends that the measure be Passed, with Amendments. The votes were as follows: 3 Ayes: Representative(s) Nakashima, Matayoshi; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Matsumoto; 0 Noes: none; and 0 Excused: none.

The Conference committee recommends that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes of the Senate Conference Managers were as follows: 2 Aye(s): Senator(s) Rhoads, Lee; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Fevella; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Keohokalole.
Reported from Conference Committee (Conf Com. Rep. No. 53-22) as amended in (CD 1).
Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday 05-03-22.
Reported from Conference Committee as amended CD 1 (Conf. Com. Rep. No. 53-22).
48 Hrs. Notice (as amended CD 1) 05-03-22.
Passed Final Reading, as amended (CD 1) Ayes, 24; Aye(s) with reservations: none. Noes, 1 (Senator(s) Fevella). Excused, 0 (none).
Passed Final Reading as amended in CD 1 with none voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Eli, Har, Kong, Matsumoto, McDermott, Okimoto, Tokioka, Ward voting no (8) and none excused (0).
Received notice of Final Reading (Sen. Com. No. 946).
Received notice of passage on Final Reading in House (Hse. Com. No. 824).
Transmitted to Governor.

votes.desc: House Judiciary & Hawaiian Affairs: Passed, With Amendments
